name: AImagination
description:
3/24 Updated images and prompts. Apparently some people still are not seeing them though. See the bottom for prompting details if missing.

This is a checkpoint I blended from a ton of others here on CivitAI. It is extremely versatile and can be used for just about anything I have tested it on so far.

This works on simple and very detailed prompts. I would say it is tilted toward NSFW photorealism but it can do scenery as well.

The model should not need a VAE but if you really want to make it a little better you can copy itself into the VAE folder to use. It does seem to slightly improve results especially on high detail people faces.

I will never remember the full blend because it was mixed and reverse mixed a few times. However Faetastic did a lot to help certain aspects of this blend so I need to give a shout out there. I know URPM, Realistic Vision, Deliberate, Consistent Factor, and AnalogMadness were also used.

"(64k, hdr, uhd, award winning photography) photo of *subject*" are good keywords to use for photorealistic. Feel free to get really detailed with the prompts as well. Paragraphs wont hurt it too much just might want to turn guidance down a little.

Below is another example. if you change "pretty female wearing gray corset in rose garden moonlit night" you will get the results above. I just put pretty goth female in dimly lit room instead, very basic. For the ones with flowers, etc they just follow some basic rules:

((64k, uhd, masterpiece, exposure blend, hdr)), (pretty female wearing gray corset in rose garden moonlit night), pale, ((headshot portrait)), (RAW photo), (award winning photography), (facing camera), (thin), sharp focus, (contrasting colors), dyed hair

This does not need any of the keywords I put, they just help with quality but are NOT required to use this model. This will take very basic prompts from "Pretty girl" to examples listed above. I hope this clears up the prompting. if something specific is missing you want to know just ask but I think everything is covered now.

-DvCl

meta.prompt: In the heart of an enchanted forest, an elven empress adorned with intricate gold and emerald jewelry stands gracefully upon a magnificent ivory platform, as a legion of majestic white stags bow before her, amidst the swirling golden leaves of autumn and the soothing melodies of a mystical woodland choir.
meta.negativePrompt: blurry, low detail, poorly drawn, incorrect

meta.prompt: 64k uhd hdr, A mermaid holding on to a giant bioluminescent jellyfish in a glowing coral reef.
meta.negativePrompt: text, logo, watermark, ((black and white)), extra leg, badly drawn feet, low detail, inaccurate

meta.prompt: (64k, hdr, uhd) photo of a blue green frog sitting on a lily pad.
(64k, uhd, hdr), A fierce werewolf huntress with a silver blade, stalking through a moonlit forest with pack of loyal wolves.
meta.negativePrompt: text, logo, watermark, ((black and white)), extra leg, badly drawn feet, low detail, inaccurate

meta.prompt: (64k, uhd, hdr), A graceful faerie queen with butterfly wings, wearing a crown of silver leaves and holding a scepter made of crystal.
meta.negativePrompt: text, logo, watermark, ((black and white)), extra leg, badly drawn feet, low detail, inaccurate

meta.prompt: ((64k, uhd, masterpiece, exposure blend, hdr)), (pretty female wearing gray corset in rose garden moonlit night), pale, ((headshot portrait)), (RAW photo), (award winning photography), (facing camera), (thin), sharp focus, (contrasting colors), dyed hair
